RT @absurdistwords: For anyone who thinks this is normal I invite you to look at past posts of the FBI account and compare subject matter o‚Ä¶

RT @absurdistwords: MOST of this stuff is directly related to issues raised in this campaign.

This is not accidental
RT @absurdistwords: If this were an account merely posting interesting public records that would be one thing, but to start now?
RT @absurdistwords: That more than one of this last batch refer to the candidates in this election is incredibly suspicious given the Hatch‚Ä¶
RT @absurdistwords: Previously it just seemed to release FOIA-released documents of general interest. Mostly on deceased public figures
RT @absurdistwords: It seems to be disseminating information related to both candidates, #Comey, FBI recordkeeping policy and protests
RT @absurdistwords: I thought perhaps it was a satire account, but it seems not to be by all inspection

RT @absurdistwords: It only HAS 131 tweets in total. But now is churning out election-related information.

What the hell IS this? https://‚Ä¶
RT @absurdistwords: In the past 2 days it has tweeted more information than in the entire latter half of 2015
RT @absurdistwords: The FBI account is Twitter verified and previous to this week it tweeted once or twice a month, and not in a year
RT @absurdistwords: This FBI account has been dormant since fall of 2015 and just began tweeting two days ago. https://t.co/eWGc7tnJpX

posts.title: Experiments With Live Looping Performance
posts.dek: In which we delve into the artistry of live looping, illuminating the core concepts and essential gear that enable musicians to create immersive soundscapes on the fly

posts.title: Joy Driven Development
posts.dek: In which we use joy and curiosity as fuel to propel us forward

posts.title: The Art Of Coding
posts.dek: In which we go into detail about how to write code to accomplish a goal

commits.message: fix: prevent layout shift in historical comparison numbers (#679)
fix: Add Handlebars content interpolation for capability variables
feat: switch to single quotes, no semicolons, add max-depth rule, fix all lint errors
feat: add ESLint configuration and auto-fix formatting
refactor: Replace regex interpolation with Handlebars template engine
fix: Resolve ESLint parsing error in saveMenu empty message
docs: update README with recent improvements from last 30 commits
feat: Add sequence capability for chaining workflows
design: Transform inline save summary to cutting-edge modern design
feat: Enable capability execution from scheduled reminders
refactor: Standardize icon sizing and spacing for perfect consistency
fix: make green dot visible and slow ticker animation
chore(release): v0.2.0
chore: add versioning and changelog automation
feat: Add smart, appropriate icons throughout save UI
refactor: Replace emojis with beautiful Lucide icons in empty states
fix: make ticker and connection indicator more visible
refactor: Enhance empty states with warmth, context, and visual delight
fix(scheduler): Handle dynamic job names by checking job.data.type
feat: add contrast validation, tweakcc exporter, and cyberpunk-themed previews
feat: improve ticker loop and connection indicator
feat: Restore CMD-S / Ctrl-S quick save keyboard shortcut
refactor: Comprehensive UX polish pass - user-friendly language throughout
fix: improve ticker spacing and add placeholder scroll
refactor: Use proper shadcn/ui components throughout save UI
feat: add live activity ticker and auto-advance to dashboard
feat: Complete capability-specific learning system with tag-based retrieval
refactor: Swiss-gridify ALL save-related components with gap-4 rhythm
refactor: Convert save UI to CSS Grid with consistent spacing rhythm
fix: skip AI extractions when content is insufficient
fix: improve financial analysis JSON extraction and increase token limit
refactor: Remove hover effects from save UI
fix: improve location extraction to prevent geocoding failures
polish: Luxury-level refinement of save UI - comprehensive detail pass
feat: add comprehensive error logging to repair script
fix: Remove remaining dark: modifiers from table variant buttons
fix: improve repair script - add reasoning fields and fail-fast error handling
refactor: Audit and clean up save UI to use design system properly
feat: Add automatic system theme detection to dashboard
chore: Bump version to v1.3.1
feat: Add HTTP capability logging and Brain memory analytics endpoint
feat: Add /api/stats/memory-users endpoint for memory statistics
feat: Realtime dashboard, screenshot repair, and robust relationship extraction
feat: Complete thumbnail pipeline for .metro saves + cityCode fixes
feat(capabilities): Add general-purpose HTTP capability for Artie
Fix padding on About and Experience pages
chore: Update brain submodule with analytics and search endpoints
feat(brain): Add flexible analytics and search endpoints
Ruthlessly delete content, rebuild menu architecture
perf: Fix unnecessary migration re-checks on HomePage
Initial commit: Battlefield 6 stats scraper
chore: Update brain submodule with health check and related_message_id fixes
feat(database): Add related_message_id for full conversation threading
fix(brain): Fix health check port and add related_message_id support
Remove boxes-inside-boxes, flatten design
Add hero video section to homepage
Mobile UX improvements across all routes
Add full-screen cover background image sections to menu
Apply rigorous Swiss magazine grid to menu page
Add elegant inverted footer with business information
Clean up About page with consistent typography and structure
Tighten letter-spacing on handwritten text
Increase handwritten font size for better readability
Add handwritten font (Caveat) for italic text flavor
Integrate custom fonts and flatten layout design
docs: Add detailed comments to all remaining regexes
Implement Swiss-inspired typographical rhythm system
refactor: Remove last regex duplication in MetroSaveFormat
Typography improvements: Add DM Serif Display and clean up inconsistencies
refactor: Clean up duplicated code patterns (no new files)
Transform site into professional B2B + customer-facing coffee cart platform
chore: Update brain submodule with Redis connection fixes
feat: Add toast notifications for disk space errors
feat: Add global save lock and disk space handling
fix(critical): Use shared Redis connection in Brain API queue endpoints
fix: Correct Discord API port in mention-proxy capability
feat: Add production Dockerfile with correct ports
feat: Add operations script and improve .gitignore
fix: Restore title prop for autosave indicator and remove unused ts-expect-error
chore: Remove tutorial i18n (TutorialOverlay was reverted)
feat: v1.3.0 - MediaWiki integration, GitHub automation, and Discord enhancements
chore: Remove signal panel i18n (not needed for autosave)
chore: Remove tutorial i18n (not required for autosave)
chore: Bump version to 1.3.0
chore: Remove non-save i18n (signal details, update progress)
chore: Remove non-save i18n changes (credits, financial dashboard)
chore: Remove more unrelated changes (import cleanup, TS comments)
chore: Remove unrelated changes from autosave PR
Merge origin/beta into feature/clean-autosave
